section.section: A health care institution may not use any money received from a bond issued by the Authority to match any State loan or grant that is available for improvement of a health care institution.
The Authority shall comply with the terms and conditions of assistance received in accordance with subsection (a)(6) of this section.

text.section: The Authority may delegate to a member or officer a power granted to the Authority by this subtitle, including the power to execute a bond, certificate, deed, lease, mortgage, agreement, or other document or instrument.
